name: DeleteAsanaTask
description:
Delete an existing task in Asana, moving it to trash.

Use this tool to delete a specific task in Asana. The task will be moved to the user's trash, where it can be recovered within 30 days. This tool is useful for managing tasks that are no longer needed or were created by mistake.

parameters.name: task_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the task to delete in Asana.

parameters.name: pretty_output_enabled
parameters.description: Set to true for 'pretty' formatted response, useful for debugging. May increase response size and time.

value_schema.description:
Provides “pretty” output.
Provides the response in a “pretty” format. In the case of JSON this means doing proper line breaking and indentation to make it readable. This will take extra time and increase the response size so it is advisable only to use this during debugging.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the asana API.

parameters.description:
